actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend section 552, of title 5, United States Code (known, as the "Freedom of Information Act"), to provide for the award of court costs and reasonable attorneys' fees to successful complainants that seek certain Federal agency information.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides, under the Freedom of Information Act, for the award of court costs and reasonable attorneys' fees to successful complainants that seek specified Federal agency information. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 552 (a)(3))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 552, of title 5, United States Code (known, as the "Freedom of Information Act"), to provide for the award of court costs and reasonable attorneys' fees to successful complainants that seek certain Federal agency information.
